skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy 3 times. Each hit has a 15% chance of increasing the duration of [HP Burn] debuffs on the target by 1 turn.

skills.desc:
Attacks all enemies. Has an 80% chance of placing a 25% [Weaken] debuff for 2 turns. Also has an 80% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns if there are at least 2 enemies under [HP Burn] debuffs. 

Then instantly activates any [HP Burn] debuffs on each target and decreases the duration of those [HP Burn] debuffs by 1 turn.

skills.desc: Places a [HP Burn] debuff on this Champion for 3 turns, then attacks all enemies. Has a 75% chance of placing a [HP Burn] debuff on all enemies for 3 turns. Grants an Extra Turn if a [HP Burn] debuff is placed on all enemies.
